name: 數學與電腦專題（二）
description: 培養學生對使用相關教學軟體的認識，並利用數學知識進行數學教育研究設計。
goals: 能了解相關軟體的基本功能及操作
能運用軟體的特性進行數學教育研究
syllabus:
1.  The Strength of the Community: How GeoGebra can Inspire Technology Integration in Mathematics
2.  Toward Model-Centered Mathematics Learning and Instruction Using GeoGebra: A Theoretical Framework for Learning Mathematics with Understanding
3.  Using Dynamic Geometry to Bring the Real World into the Classroom
4.  GeoGebra: From Simulation to Formalization in Teacher Preparation and Inservice Programs
5.  Building Simulators with GeoGebra
6.  Influence of GeoGebra on Problem Solving Strategies
7.  GeoGebra as a Conceptual Tool for Modeling
8.  Modeling the Cube Using GeoGebra
9.  Visualization Through Dynamic GeoGebra Illustrations
10.  GeoGebra as a Cognitive Tool: Where Cognitive Theories and Technology Meet
11.  Approaches to Calculus Using GeoGebra
12.  Rebirth of Euclidean Geometry?
